sys_script_include.name: selfReportQueryService

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c440c1f6db1820105de6f9751d961992
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_emergency_al.selfReportQueryService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>selfReportQueryService</name><script><![CDATA[var selfReportQueryService = Class.create();
selfReportQueryService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    updateStatusData: function(table, sysID, returnFields) {
        var output = {};
        var labelWithValues = [];
        var description = '';
		returnFields = returnFields.split(',');
        gs.info('Table:-' + table + 'sysId' + sysID + 'returnFields=>' + returnFields);
        var glideObject = new GlideRecord(table);
        glideObject.get(sysID);
        returnFields.forEach(function(fieldName) {
			gs.info('@MRT:-Value'+glideObject.getDisplayValue(fieldName)+'Lable'+glideObject[fieldName].getLabel());
            fieldName = fieldName.trim();
            labelWithValues.push({
                "label": glideObject[fieldName].getLabel()||'',
                "value": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "value": glideObject.getDisplayValue(fieldName) ||''
                }
            });
        });
        output.sidebarContent = labelWithValues;
        output.description = glideObject.describe_the_emergency;

        return output;
    },

    type: 'selfReportQueryService'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>raviteja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-09 07:20:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>c440c1f6db1820105de6f9751d961992</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>selfReportQueryService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Emergency Alert" source="x_snc_emergency_al">2962137651c42010f8776b3ef04affc3</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Emergency Alert">2962137651c42010f8776b3ef04affc3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c440c1f6db1820105de6f9751d961992</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>raviteja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-09 07:20:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
